solution_line_template: The estimated time of arrival from Washington to Idaho is {distance_washington_idaho}/{speed_washington_idaho}= <<{distance_washington_idaho}/{speed_washington_idaho}={time_washington_idaho}>>{time_washington_idaho} hours.
So, the estimated time of arrival from Idaho to Nevada is {distance_idaho_nevada}/{speed_idaho_nevada}=<<{distance_idaho_nevada}/{speed_idaho_nevada}={time_idaho_nevada}>>{time_idaho_nevada} hours.
